name: @wellwelwel/node-and-vite-helpers

scripts.init:update: npm run init; npm run update;
scripts.update: node './scripts/update-packages.js'; npm i --ignore-scripts; npm audit fix;
scripts.update:patch: npm run update; npm version patch --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.update:minor: npm run update; npm version minor --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.update:major: npm run update; npm version major --no-git-tag-version;

author: https://github.com/wellwelwel
description: ðŸŒ± A personal compilation with helpers to NodeJS and Vite
